text: The Anna Cross () is a 1954 Soviet drama movie directed by Isidor Annensky.Лучшее с молотка: классика Киностудии им. Горького, распродающей имуществоАнна на шее (1954) It stars Alla Larionova, Vladimir Vladislavskiy, and Aleksandr Sashin-Nikolsky. == Actors == * Alla Larionova as Anna * Vladimir Vladislavskiy as Modest Alekseyevich * Aleksandr Sashin-Nikolsky as Pyotr Leontievich, father * Mikhail Zharov as Artynov * Alexander Vertinsky as The Prince * Irina Murzaeva as Mavra Grigorievna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Isidor Annensky
title: The Anna Cross
